TopicTitle: Show off your best bugs, your graphical glitches and other weird moments here.

Articles.Content:
We have all had KSP glitch out on us from time to time, and sometimes we remember to hit F1 when it happens, this is the thread for those things that may have ruined your flight but sure looked cool while doing it.

Veto Aerospace would like to assure all involved that it is not testing weapons of mass partying.

Had a moment about a month ago where my spaceplane fuselage (the rest had been ripped off) began to spin uncontrollably and violently after hitting a texture seam. It fell into the ocean and kept bobbing up and out of the water, splashing back in and thrashing violently before jumping out again.

I had a few pictures, but decided it did not do the event any justice at all, so I deleted them. Video is required, really; it\'s just so bizarre.

The ASAS module on the first pic tried to learn to fly. Really. It was jumping up for 0.5m with the winglets ;D

The second one shows a Kraken-powered reactor.
